bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: Ufs recursive listStatus strips out leading character from path
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.3.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug When syncing / loading a path from the UFS into Alluxio, the path in Alluxio may not reflect the path in HDFS as the leading character is incorrectly stripped out. To Reproduce
Created dir /tmp in HDFS Start Alluxio with root mount = root of HDFS Start sync immediately upon Alluxio startup /tmp in HDFS shows up as /mp in Alluxio
Expected behavior /tmp in HDFS should show up as /tmp in Alluxio Urgency Urgent, sync on root on Alluxio namespace is unusable as it is incorrect. Additional context There are other scenarios in which this bug will also manifest.
